attributes.action: stop teenage muggings on UK streets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why is it considered acceptable that our children are routinely mugged on our local neighborhood streets daily and our government are putting their heads in the sand....
Police need to be given by law zero tolerance powers and need to do the job on the streets not behind a desk.	
If your child has been mugged please sign  my petition and let as many people know about it so we can try &  make this government do something about it…………
Please help us  to help our kids!!!
